text: The IBSF World Championships 2017 took place at the Königssee bobsleigh, luge, and skeleton track in Königssee, Germany, from 13 to 26 February 2017. ==Schedule== Six events were held. All times are local (UTC+1). {| class="wikitable" border="1" |- ! Date ! Time !
